Harpy.name: draconian
Harpy.description: Towering seven feet tall from horns to toes this imposing yet shapely figure is clad only in skin and gleaming green scales. The scales cover hear forearms, calves and her flanks but leave her shapely ass and magnificent rack clad only in skin and glory. Though perhaps what only adds to her tremble inducing majesty are the leathery wings from her back and the long reptilian tail snaking from above that aforementioned well formed derriere.
